mapper.select: SELECT MF_DATE, HOUSE_INFO, ENG, GAS, ELECTRIC, WATER, TRASH, TRASH_FOOD FROM ENERGY_USAGE WHERE HOUSE_INFO = #{houseInfo} AND MF_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-6), 'YYMM')) AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYMM') ORDER BY MF_DATE
SELECT MF_DATE, HOUSE_INFO, ENG, GAS, ELECTRIC, WATER, TRASH, TRASH_FOOD FROM ENERGY_USAGE WHERE MF_DATE = #{mfDate} ORDER BY MF_DATE
